versatile.Notes: Despite it's blistering fire rate, the Kord is a highly dependable lethal AR that shines even without attachments.

close.Notes: Despite it's blistering fire rate, the Kord is a highly dependable lethal AR that shines even without attachments.

versatile.Notes: A decent, versatile AR that performs well over range with careful burst firing.

close.Notes: A decent, versatile AR that performs well over range with careful burst firing.

versatile.Notes: A hard-hitting powerhouse that boasts increadible accuracy, but is extremely sensitive to player movement. Be sure not to move when firing.

close.Notes: A hard-hitting powerhouse that boasts increadible accuracy, but is extremely sensitive to player movement. Be sure not to move when firing.

versatile.Notes: A high-damage AR with tons of potential, but extremely prone to spread. Fire Carefully.

close.Notes: A high-damage AR with tons of potential, but extremely prone to spread. Fire Carefully.

versatile.Notes: An inconsistent, difficult-to-control AR that leads the AR category in TTK but struggles with any engagement beyond midrange.

close.Notes: An inconsistent, difficult-to-control AR that leads the AR category in TTK but struggles with any engagement beyond midrange.

versatile.Notes: With curvaceous but controllable recoil, the <c>M4A1</c> rewards competent recoil management with a very fast TTK.

close.Notes: With curvaceous but controllable recoil, the <c>M4A1</c> rewards competent recoil management with a very fast TTK.

versatile.Notes: A satisfying-feeling bullpup with reliable accuracy and easily controllable recoil.

close.Notes: A satisfying-feeling bullpup with reliable accuracy and easily controllable recoil.

versatile.Notes: A decently-fast fire rate mixed with moderate recoil and spread make the <c>SG</c> difficult to wield at distance, but undeniable in close quarters.

close.Notes: A decently-fast fire rate mixed with moderate recoil and spread make the <c>SG</c> difficult to wield at distance, but undeniable in close quarters.

versatile.Notes: The <c>QBZ</c> offers a fast fire rate and great accuracy, giving it a high ceiling with good recoil management.

close.Notes: The <c>QBZ</c> offers a fast fire rate and great accuracy, giving it a high ceiling with good recoil management.

versatile.Notes: While entirely unimpressive in full-auto, the <c>M277</c>'s true potential lies in its DMR-like performance in semi-auto.

close.Notes: While entirely unimpressive in full-auto, the <c>M277</c>'s true potential lies in its DMR-like performance in semi-auto.

versatile.Notes: The <c>SOR</c> is extremely accurate, but has some of the most punishing damage drop-offs at range. Expect great accuracy, but long TTKs.

close.Notes: The <c>SOR</c> is extremely accurate, but has some of the most punishing damage drop-offs at range. Expect great accuracy, but long TTKs.

versatile.Notes: One of the most accurate weapons counterbalanced by having some of the least damage and most punishing range dropoffs. Guaranteed to hit its shots, but not guaranteed to win the gunfights.

close.Notes: One of the most accurate weapons counterbalanced by having some of the least damage and most punishing range dropoffs. Guaranteed to hit its shots, but not guaranteed to win the gunfights.

versatile.Notes: A hard-hitting but spiky and magazine-limited weapon that has potential that is difficult to unearth. Handle with care.

close.Notes: A hard-hitting but spiky and magazine-limited weapon that has potential that is difficult to unearth. Handle with care.

versatile.Notes: A middle of the pack AR that does not excel in any particular area, but tends to hit its shots.

close.Notes: A middle of the pack AR that does not excel in any particular area, but tends to hit its shots.

versatile.Notes: A low-capacity, high-damage AR that performs moderately well. Requires constant reload maintenance.

close.Notes: A low-capacity, high-damage AR that performs moderately well. Requires constant reload maintenance.

versatile.Notes: A close-range slaughterhouse with incredible TTK, but enormous recoil and plenty of spread limits this AR's midrange capability.

close.Notes: A close-range slaughterhouse with incredible TTK, but enormous recoil and plenty of spread limits this AR's midrange capability.

versatile.Notes: Any operator that can control the spiky, jumpy vertical recoil will be rewarded for their accuracy. high potential.

close.Notes: Any operator that can control the spiky, jumpy vertical recoil will be rewarded for their accuracy. high potential.

versatile.Notes: Capable of two-tapping and dropping enemies before they can react, the <c>SVDM</c> is highly rewarding in the right hands.

close.Notes: Capable of two-tapping and dropping enemies before they can react, the <c>SVDM</c> is highly rewarding in the right hands.

versatile.Notes: Capable of one-shot headshot kills with Hollow Point rounds, the <c>SVK</c> stays true to its role as a light, lean marksman's tool.

close.Notes: Capable of one-shot headshot kills with Hollow Point rounds, the <c>SVK</c> stays true to its role as a light, lean marksman's tool.

versatile.Notes: With a fast fire rate, low damage, small magazine, and a punishing reload, the <c>LMR27</c> is high risk for low reward. Difficult.

close.Notes: With a fast fire rate, low damage, small magazine, and a punishing reload, the <c>LMR27</c> is high risk for low reward. Difficult.

long.Notes: A modular and extremely lethal, versatile battle piece. Shreds over range and single-fires anything over long distance.

versatile.Notes: A modular and extremely lethal, versatile battle piece. Shreds over range and single-fires anything over long distance.

close.Notes: A modular and extremely lethal, versatile battle piece. Shreds over range and single-fires anything over long distance.

long.Notes: The ultimate reliable & dependable weapon that maintains accuracy over range with outstanding velocity.

versatile.Notes: The ultimate reliable & dependable weapon that maintains accuracy over range with outstanding velocity.

close.Notes: The ultimate reliable & dependable weapon that maintains accuracy over range with outstanding velocity.

long.Notes: With no damage dropoff at all, the <c>M250</c> carries the same TTK at any distance - it's just up to the operator to hit their shots to achieve the breakneck TTK.

versatile.Notes: With no damage dropoff at all, the <c>M250</c> carries the same TTK at any distance - it's just up to the operator to hit their shots to achieve the breakneck TTK.

close.Notes: With no damage dropoff at all, the <c>M250</c> carries the same TTK at any distance - it's just up to the operator to hit their shots to achieve the breakneck TTK.

long.Notes: An extremely accurate LMG that packs marksman-level accuracy with decent magazine capacity.

versatile.Notes: An extremely accurate LMG that packs marksman-level accuracy with decent magazine capacity.

close.Notes: An extremely accurate LMG that packs marksman-level accuracy with decent magazine capacity.

long.Notes: A classic 100-round suppressive monster with moderate accuracy.

versatile.Notes: A classic 100-round suppressive monster with moderate accuracy.

close.Notes: A classic 100-round suppressive monster with moderate accuracy.

long.Notes: Hard-hitting but shaky, the <c>M240L</c> requires handling with care. Does not excel in any category.

versatile.Notes: Hard-hitting but shaky, the <c>M240L</c> requires handling with care. Does not excel in any category.

close.Notes: Hard-hitting but shaky, the <c>M240L</c> requires handling with care. Does not excel in any category.

long.Notes: Heavy, bulky, and powerful, the <c>M/60</c> can shine when fired carefully with an operator who can control the recoil.

versatile.Notes: Heavy, bulky, and powerful, the <c>M/60</c> can shine when fired carefully with an operator who can control the recoil.

close.Notes: Heavy, bulky, and powerful, the <c>M/60</c> can shine when fired carefully with an operator who can control the recoil.

long.Notes: A close-range powerhouse that shreds anything up to midrange, but struggles at long-range engagements.

versatile.Notes: A close-range powerhouse that shreds anything up to midrange, but struggles at long-range engagements.

close.Notes: A close-range powerhouse that shreds anything up to midrange, but struggles at long-range engagements.

versatile.Notes: An eight-round revolver with a decent fire rate. Kills in a minimum of two shots in Multiplayer, regardless of head or body shot.
The stock pistol offers moderate damage and a fast fire rate, but complicating muzzle rise may obscure targets.
The six-shooting backup pocket rocket offers excellent hipfire and a devastating one-two punch, but harshly punishes any missed shots.
Guaranteed to grant style points, the <c>M45A1</c> packs high damage but demands high accuracy to compensate for its low magazine capacity.
A low-damage, fast-firing implement that really falls behind TTK-wise.
An enthusiastic choice that excels in no category, but offers the familiar, satisfying feeling and performance.
An extremely strong semi-auto shotgun that is able to deal significant damage with two rapid shots before pumping.

close.Notes: An extremely strong semi-auto shotgun that is able to deal significant damage with two rapid shots before pumping.
A shotgun enthusiast's choice, the <c>M1014</c> delivers devastating semi-auto performance.

versatile.Notes: A highly consistent pump-action room clearer, guaranteed to drop enemies over impressive range in ADS.

close.Notes: A highly consistent pump-action room clearer, guaranteed to drop enemies over impressive range in ADS.

versatile.Notes: An extremely easy-to-use powerhouse that excels in CQC but packs enough accuracy to perform well at midrange.

close.Notes: An extremely easy-to-use powerhouse that excels in CQC but packs enough accuracy to perform well at midrange.

versatile.Notes: With a 50-round base magazine and excellent accuracy, the <c>USG</c> is an incredibly capable and versatile slayer.

close.Notes: With a 50-round base magazine and excellent accuracy, the <c>USG</c> is an incredibly capable and versatile slayer.

versatile.Notes: The familiar-feeling <c>MP5</c> packs excellent accuracy with a midrange TTK, making it extremely dependable even in midrange.

close.Notes: The familiar-feeling <c>MP5</c> packs excellent accuracy with a midrange TTK, making it extremely dependable even in midrange.

versatile.Notes: The <c>PW7A2</c> makes up for its extremely low damage with an incredible fire rate and competitive TTK. You'll constantly be reloading, but constantly piling bodies.

close.Notes: The <c>PW7A2</c> makes up for its extremely low damage with an incredible fire rate and competitive TTK. You'll constantly be reloading, but constantly piling bodies.

versatile.Notes: An ultra-accurate SMG that barely spreads at distance over sustained fire, but has the slowest SMG TTK. Configurable to pack 60 rounds, the SL9 has great potential per reload.

close.Notes: An ultra-accurate SMG that barely spreads at distance over sustained fire, but has the slowest SMG TTK. Configurable to pack 60 rounds, the SL9 has great potential per reload.

versatile.Notes: With a Mach-5 fire rate but so little magazine capacity, the <c>KV9</c> can shred exactly one or two opponents before forcing a reload. Requires very thoughtful and tactical use.

close.Notes: With a Mach-5 fire rate but so little magazine capacity, the <c>KV9</c> can shred exactly one or two opponents before forcing a reload. Requires very thoughtful and tactical use.

versatile.Notes: The classic UMP boasts impressive accuracy, but one of the slowest TTKs in the SMG category, which is fine - because sometimes hitting your shots is a lot better than missing due to spread.

close.Notes: The classic UMP boasts impressive accuracy, but one of the slowest TTKs in the SMG category, which is fine - because sometimes hitting your shots is a lot better than missing due to spread.

versatile.Notes: The <c>SCW</c> may pack a tiny magazine, but makes up for it with an excellent TTK and outstanding accuracy.

close.Notes: The <c>SCW</c> may pack a tiny magazine, but makes up for it with an excellent TTK and outstanding accuracy.
